transcript: I did want to see it. I still do. I always do. I keep thinking that this time will be the time it just never is.

segments.text: I did want to see it. I still do. I always do. I keep thinking that this time will be the time it just never is.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I did want to see it I still do, I always do.  I keep thinking that this time will be the time but it just never is.
